config.no_mobs_destroy_block.title: No Mobs Destroy Block
config.no_mobs_destroy_block.disabled_en: List of entity IDs that should be prevented from destroying blocks
config.no_mobs_destroy_block.explosion_e: Whether to enable explosion effects (damage, particles, sounds) while preventing block damage
config.no_mobs_destroy_block.enderman_pi: Whether to prevent Endermen from picking up blocks
config.no_mobs_destroy_block.wither_dama: Whether to prevent Wither from damaging blocks with blue skulls
